input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product specifications and product name.

Product name:
Toro Bypass Pruners with Rotating Handle 29202

Product specifications:
Bypass pruner with a rotating handle and 1-inch cutting capacity
Patented 2-position lock for smaller handle spread
Drop forged aluminum body; high carbon sword steel blade
Patented center oiler bolt technology
Lifetime warranty
Ergonomically shaped handles with TPR
Rotating lower handle

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This Toro bypass pruner is easy to use and has a rotating handle to make cutting easier. It has a 1-inch cutting capacity and a patented 2-position lock for smaller handle spread. It also features a drop forged aluminum body and high carbon sword steel blade for durability and precision. The center oiler bolt technology ensures the blades stay lubricated, and the handles are ergonomically shaped with TPR for comfort.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
